entries.text: Call center very angry customers roleplay call number one call center agent and customer
Thank you for calling Single Step Financial how may I assist you today?
I have been on hold for an hour and I'm so angry right now I need to speak to someone about my account
I apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced I understand how frustrating that can be may I please have your account number so that I can address the issue?
It's 495-2119 and I need to know why my account was charged an extra fee
Let's see if we can find out why you were charged an extra fee
The bill says it's a late fee but my payment was not late I don't get where this charge came from
I would be happy to look into this for you
May I have your contact information so that I can follow up with you once I have more information?
You have my phone number you have my email I just want this resolved right away
I understand I'm so sorry I just found your contact information
I will investigate this right away and get back to you as soon as possible with an update
Would you prefer a text message or an email?
Just send me a text message
Thank you for bringing this to our attention please give me a couple of hours to look into the issue and I will text you back
Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No I just want an answer today
Yes I understand I will get back to you about this matter as soon as possible
I've heard that before
Call center very angry customers call number two call center agent and customer
Hello thank you for calling Single Step Mobile my name is Scott how may I assist you?
I have been trying to get a hold of your company for days and no one will help me I can't believe the level of incompetence
I apologize for the difficulty you have had trying to reach our support team I know how frustrating that can be may I have your account number so that I can look up your information?
My account number is 994571023 and I need to cancel my service right now
Let me just pull up your account information I do apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced for verification purposes may I have your first and last name please
What a waste of time fine it's Barbara T Simpson
Thank you Miss Simpson could you please tell me the reason for the cancellation so that I may assist you with the process?
I'm moving overseas
I understand I would be happy to assist you with the cancellation process
Could you please provide me with your new mailing address so that I can update it for our records?
I told you I am moving out of the country
I understand that Miss Simpson however we are supposed to obtain the customer's new mailing address for our files
But I am not using your service anymore like never again
I am sorry to hear that and I do understand do you happen to have a state-side address where we can send your final statement?
Why can't you just email it to me?
I am afraid we have to send a paper copy as well for canceled accounts
Whatever let's just get this over with you can mail it to my mother's address
which is 3817 Rockland Street Boise Idaho 83703
Thank you Miss Simpson I will process the cancellation for you right away is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No are we done?
Yes that is all thank you again for being a customer with Single Step Mobile
Yeah yeah save it for the next person bye
Goodbye ma'am
Call center very angry customers call number three call center agent and customer
Thank you for calling Single Step Internet my name is Sandra how may I help you today?
Hi Sandra I don't know what you people are doing but my internet has been down all morning listen
This is the third time I have called you guys what the hell is going on there?
I do apologize for the lack of service in your area we have been experiencing some service issues in a few different parts of the city today
Could you please provide me with your account number so I can check if you are located in one of those areas?
Fine my account number is 400721105
I really need my internet service in order to do my job do you have any idea how long this is going to continue?
Let me just check your account information
It looks like we have our tech crew working on the problem right now
Well I cannot give you an exact time they expect the issue to be resolved in a few hours
A few hours what the
This is really setting me back I have an online meeting this afternoon
I do apologize for the inconvenience we are doing everything in our power to get it up and running as soon as possible
I will send you a text message when our tech crew resolves the issue in your area
I need my internet Sandra
Again I do apologize for the trouble this is causing you
Yeah all right goodbye
Goodbye
Remember to watch our other roleplay videos
